trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies scope of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" /> as a page, document, or sequence of documents.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" /> 的范围指定为页、文档或文档序列的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope of defined by <c>printTicketLevel</c>, the number of pages or the number of documents associated with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: 基于与 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" /> 关联的 <c>printTicketLevel</c>、页数或文档数定义的范围。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置打印文档时使用的默认打印机设置。

trans-unit.source: The default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: 打印文档时使用的默认打印机设置。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>属性不会验证或修改指定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>为特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>。

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要，请使用 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> 方法创建特定于 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> 的 <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>（对给定打印机有效）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> 事件的范围。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> event as for a sequence of documents, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: 指定关于文档序列、单个文档或单页的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> 事件的范围的枚举。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>属性是<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>、<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>属性指定的数与文档输出<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 对于其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>值，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>属性指定的页的输出，其中数<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages output with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取使用 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" /> 输出的文档数或页数。

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages output with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" /> 输出的文档数或页数。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>属性是<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>、<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>属性指定的数与文档输出<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 对于其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>值，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>属性指定的页的输出，其中数<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>。
